Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsat1030 pm on 9\26\2007 my friend and i were outside his house in pawling newyork when i noticed a small cluster of lights traveling north i said to him look at those lights they are like thoe ligts we saw when we were kids.(in 1960 he and i saw some lights zoooming back and forth up and down at very hi speed) he said its just a plane then it stoped and started to float in place like a boat on water and then began to change colors,it seamed to be emitting light and re absorbing light then a ring like saturn appeared we were both fascinated by this thing it began to move back and forth slowly so i took out my cell phone to take a picture.and when i did that all hell broke loose!there where these boomerang shaped lights about 4 inches wide ,where going around on the deck as if looking for something.everything seamed to be going in slow motion.my freind was saying whats goinonhere!speaking as if his voice was on 16 on a victrola. we ran into the house terrified.locked the doors and whent into the living room the two dogs were growlling and yipping at the windows then the light in the room whent on then off then on even brighter than before.i said to my friend if they are comming to get us im going out to see what they look like! so i went outside and looked up to see another one next to it they were about 2000 feet up and both were changing colors so i went back inside to get my buddy. we went out and i said you tell me where the otherone is and he pointed right at it and said its right there! iwas felling very weird and tried to write this all down when i became very dizzy and began to have numbness in my body and began to see my hands and arms turning into small dots i thought i was going to dissapear into thin air i had to get some air so we went out again and we looked up and saw a third object now it was around 1am in the morning and neither one of us can remember how we got to bed!i had a boil like leation on my tounge that hurt like hell down my neck.the next day it was gone! the following year i went back to visit my buddy again and told him that at 10:30 we would see some more ufos and at 10:20 we saw them again!this time they were flashing like flash bulbs we looked with our binoculars and saw one (there were three again)that had two white lightrs and a long green antenna that was wiggling around! i contacted marylin childs in bothel wa. after i told her about all of this, she said to contact you guys. ineed to talk with some one about all of this i cant stop thinking about it. since then i have seen some more out here in seattle in broad daylight with witnesses everyone thinks im nuts! help!
Summary: Three seperate objects changing colors red green blue white first one then a second then a third all floated into same area dogs barking lights going on and off time lapsemy freind and I both saw same things and both of us have no idea where 1 hour or
